BeReal - Your Friends for Real

Brief: BeReal invites you to participate in a groundbreaking social media experience rooted in authenticity. Break free from the chains of controlled and filtered digital interactions, as this app delivers an innovative platform for sharing genuine moments through photos. Each day, at an unexpected moment, it prompts you to snap a photo within a two-minute window, encapsulating the raw and unfiltered realities of life.
